column5: The Panorama Room is a tastefully furnished space with expansive views of the Texas Hill Country. You'll be greeted by an entire wall of panoramic windows featuring miles and miles of the Wimberley Valley. Relax with your morning coffee on the large deck before heading out to explore Wimberley. We're just minutes from town square, Blue Hole, Jacob's Well, and many lovely wineries. Several cottages available!
column8: Hill Country Views from Your King Bed!
